Desc.entry: A support group for people in Sheffield affected by lung disease. Aims to improve the quality of life by providing support and practical information for people who suffer from any lung disease, including asthma, emphysema, bronchitis and cancer. Organises occasional social trips. Affiliated to the British Lung Foundation. Self or any referral.

ProvisionPlaceDisabledAccess.entry: Infra red hearing system, Voice synthesiser/visual display in lift, Braille plan of building
